call_in_a_favor.name: Call in a Favor
call_in_a_favor.body: Take 1 adventurer of each type (1 Fighter, 1 Rogue, 1 Wizard, 1 Cleric) from the supply.
call_in_a_favor.details: One of the most powerful Utility cards. Provides one of each adventurer type.

bidding_war.name: Bidding War
bidding_war.body: Each opponent must give you 4 Gold or 2 adventurers of their choice.
bidding_war.details: Forces each opponent to make a difficult choice.

ambush.name: Ambush
ambush.body: Choose an opponent. That player must give you 1 adventurer of your choice from their tavern.
ambush.details: Direct theft from an opponent. Choose carefully.

arcane_mishap.name: Arcane Mishap
arcane_mishap.body: Each opponent must remove 1 Wizard (purple) from their tavern and return it to the supply.

bribe_agent.name: Bribe Agent
bribe_agent.body: Choose an opponent. Take 2 Gold from that player.
bribe_agent.details: Simple gold theft. Good against wealthy opponents.

change_of_plans.name: Change of Plans
change_of_plans.body: Discard 1 of your active Quests. Gain 2 VP plus adventurers equal to the Quest's requirements.
change_of_plans.summary: Utility - Discard Quest for VP + resources
change_of_plans.details: Good for abandoning a Quest you can't complete while gaining value.

free_drinks.name: Free Drinks
free_drinks.body: Each player (including you) takes 2 adventurers of their choice from the supply.
free_drinks.details: Helps everyone, but you choose first and can time it strategically.

graduation_day.name: Graduation Day
graduation_day.details: Simple but effective for Arcana quests.

lack_of_faith.name: Lack of Faith
lack_of_faith.body: Choose an opponent and a Quest type. That opponent must discard all active Quests of that type.
lack_of_faith.details: Devastating if you can identify an opponent's strategy.

recover_the_magister.name: Recover the Magister
recover_the_magister.body: MANDATORY QUEST: Give to an opponent. Requires 1 Fighter, 1 Cleric. Reward: 2 VP. Must complete before other Quests.
recover_the_magister.details: Forces opponent to waste turns completing a low-value Quest.

stamp_out_cultists.name: Stamp Out Cultists
stamp_out_cultists.body: MANDATORY QUEST: Give to an opponent. Requires 1 Rogue, 1 Wizard. Reward: 2 VP. Must complete before other Quests.
stamp_out_cultists.details: Forces opponent to collect specific adventurers before continuing.

spread_the_wealth.name: Spread the Wealth
spread_the_wealth.body: Each player (including you) takes 4 Gold from the supply.
spread_the_wealth.details: Helps everyone equally. Good when you need gold and don't mind helping others.

good_faith.name: Good Faith
good_faith.details: Simple but effective for Piety quests.

sample_wares.name: Sample Wares
sample_wares.body: Take 1 adventurer of any type and 2 Gold from the supply.
sample_wares.details: Flexible utility card providing both resources.

real_estate_deal.name: Real Estate Deal
real_estate_deal.body: Purchase a Building. Pay 4 Gold less than the normal cost (minimum 0).
real_estate_deal.details: Great for getting expensive buildings cheaply.
